statements.insert:
select SEQ_CS_STUDENT_ID.nextval as I_INTID from dual
insert into CS_Student ( I_INTID, C_studentNo, C_studentName, C_studentAge, C_studentSex, C_studentAddress, C_studentTelphone, C_createName, D_createTime, C_updateName, C_updateTime )values (#IntId#,#studentNo#,#studentName#,#studentAge#, #studentSex#,#studentAddress#,#studentTelphone#,#createName#,#createTime#,#updateName#,#updateTime#)
statements.select: select I_INTID, C_studentNo, C_studentName, C_studentAge, C_studentSex, C_studentAddress, C_studentTelphone, C_createName, D_createTime, C_updateName, C_updateTime from CS_Student order by I_IntId desc

select I_INTID, C_studentNo, C_studentName, C_studentAge, C_studentSex, C_studentAddress, C_studentTelphone, C_createName, D_createTime, C_updateName, C_updateTime from CS_Student where D_createTime between '$createTime$' and '$updateTime$' order by I_IntId desc
statements.update: update CS_Student set C_studentNo=#studentNo#, C_studentName=#studentName#, C_studentAge=#studentAge#, C_studentSex=#studentSex#, C_studentAddress=#studentAddress#, C_studentTelphone=#studentTelphone#, C_updateName=#updateName#, C_updateTime=#updateTime# where I_IntId = #IntId#
